verses.verse: Then Samuel <WH8050> took <WH3947> <WH853> a vial <WH6378> of oil, <WH8081> and poured <WH3332> it upon <WH5921> his head, <WH7218> and kissed <WH5401> him, and said, <WH559> Is it not <WH3808> because <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath anointed <WH4886> thee to be captain <WH5057> over <WH5921> his inheritance? <WH5159>

When thou art departed <WH1980> from <WH4480> <WH5973> me today, <WH3117> then thou shalt find <WH4672> two <WH8147> men <WH376> by <WH5973> Rachel's <WH7354> sepulcher <WH6900> in the border <WH1366> of Benjamin <WH1144> at Zelzah; <WH6766> and they will say <WH559> unto <WH413> thee, The asses <WH860> which <WH834> thou wentest <WH1980> to seek <WH1245> are found: <WH4672> and, lo, <WH2009> thy father <WH1> hath left <WH5203> <WH853> the care <WH1697> of the asses, <WH860> and sorroweth <WH1672> for you, saying, <WH559> What <WH4100> shall I do <WH6213> for my son? <WH1121>

Then shalt thou go on <WH2498> forward <WH1973> from thence, <WH4480> <WH8033> and thou shalt come <WH935> to <WH5704> the plain <WH436> of Tabor, <WH8396> and there <WH8033> shall meet <WH4672> thee three <WH7969> men <WH376> going up <WH5927> to <WH413> God <WH430> to Bethel, <WH1008> one <WH259> carrying <WH5375> three <WH7969> kids, <WH1423> and another <WH259> carrying <WH5375> three <WH7969> loaves <WH3603> of bread, <WH3899> and another <WH259> carrying <WH5375> a bottle <WH5035> of wine: <WH3196>
And they will salute <WH7592> <WH7965> thee, and give <WH5414> thee two <WH8147> loaves of bread; <WH3899> which thou shalt receive <WH3947> of their hands. <WH4480> <WH3027>

After that <WH310> <WH3651> thou shalt come <WH935> to the hill <WH1389> of God, <WH430> where <WH834> <WH8033> is the garrison <WH5333> of the Philistines: <WH6430> and it shall come to pass, <WH1961> when thou art come <WH935> thither <WH8033> to the city, <WH5892> that thou shalt meet <WH6293> a company <WH2256> of prophets <WH5030> coming down <WH3381> from the high place <WH4480> <WH1116> with a psaltery, <WH5035> and a tabret, <WH8596> and a pipe, <WH2485> and a harp, <WH3658> before <WH6440> them; and they <WH1992> shall prophesy: <WH5012>
And the Spirit <WH7307> of the LORD <WH3068> will come <WH6743> upon <WH5921> thee, and thou shalt prophesy <WH5012> with them, <WH5973> and shalt be turned <WH2015> into another <WH312> man. <WH376>

And let it be, <WH1961> when <WH3588> these <WH428> signs <WH226> are come <WH935> unto thee, that thou do <WH6213> as occasion serve <WH834> <WH4672> <WH3027> thee; for <WH3588> God <WH430> is with <WH5973> thee.

And thou shalt go down <WH3381> before <WH6440> me to Gilgal; <WH1537> and, behold, <WH2009> I <WH595> will come down <WH3381> unto <WH413> thee, to offer <WH5927> burnt offerings, <WH5930> and to sacrifice <WH2076> sacrifices <WH2077> of peace offerings: <WH8002> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shalt thou tarry, <WH3176> till <WH5704> I come <WH935> to <WH413> thee, and show <WH3045> thee <WH853> what <WH834> thou shalt do. <WH6213>

And it was <WH1961> so, that when he had turned <WH6437> his back <WH7926> to go <WH1980> from <WH4480> <WH5973> Samuel, <WH8050> God <WH430> gave <WH2015> him another <WH312> heart: <WH3820> and all <WH3605> those <WH428> signs <WH226> came to pass <WH935> that <WH1931> day. <WH3117>

And when they came <WH935> thither <WH8033> to the hill, <WH1389> behold, <WH2009> a company <WH2256> of prophets <WH5030> met <WH7125> him; and the Spirit <WH7307> of God <WH430> came <WH6743> upon <WH5921> him, and he prophesied <WH5012> among <WH8432> them.

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when all <WH3605> that knew <WH3045> him formerly <WH4480> <WH865> <WH8032> saw <WH7200> that, behold, <WH2009> he prophesied <WH5012> among <WH5973> the prophets, <WH5030> then the people <WH5971> said <WH559> one <WH376> to <WH413> another, <WH7453> What <WH4100> is this <WH2088> that is come <WH1961> unto the son <WH1121> of Kish? <WH7027> Is Saul <WH7586> also <WH1571> among the prophets? <WH5030>

And one <WH376> of the same place <WH4480> <WH8033> answered <WH6030> and said, <WH559> But who <WH4310> is their father? <WH1> Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> it became <WH1961> a proverb, <WH4912> Is Saul <WH7586> also <WH1571> among the prophets? <WH5030>
And when he had made an end <WH3615> of prophesying, <WH4480> <WH5012> he came <WH935> to the high place. <WH1116>

And Saul's <WH7586> uncle <WH1730> said <WH559> unto <WH413> him and to <WH413> his servant, <WH5288> Whither <WH575> went <WH1980> ye? And he said, <WH559> To seek <WH1245> <WH853> the asses: <WH860> and when we saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> they were no where, <WH369> we came <WH935> to <WH413> Samuel. <WH8050>
And Saul's <WH7586> uncle <WH1730> said, <WH559> Tell <WH5046> me, I pray thee, <WH4994> what <WH4100> Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> unto you.

And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> unto <WH413> his uncle, <WH1730> He told us plainly <WH5046> <WH5046> that <WH3588> the asses <WH860> were found. <WH4672> But of the matter <WH1697> of the kingdom, <WH4410> whereof <WH834> Samuel <WH8050> spoke, <WH559> he told <WH5046> him not. <WH3808>
And Samuel <WH8050> called the people together <WH6817> <WH853> <WH5971> unto <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> to Mizpeh; <WH4709>

And said <WH559> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> I <WH595> brought up <WH5927> <WH853> Israel <WH3478> out of Egypt, <WH4480> <WH4714> and delivered <WH5337> you out of the hand <WH4480> <WH3027> of the Egyptians, <WH4714> and out of the hand <WH4480> <WH3027> of all <WH3605> kingdoms, <WH4467> and of them that oppressed <WH3905> you:

And ye <WH859> have this day <WH3117> rejected <WH3988> <WH853> your God, <WH430> who <WH834> himself <WH1931> saved <WH3467> you out of all <WH4480> <WH3605> your adversities <WH7451> and your tribulations; <WH6869> and ye have said <WH559> unto him, Nay, but <WH3588> set <WH7760> a king <WH4428> over <WH5921> us. Now <WH6258> therefore present yourselves <WH3320> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> by your tribes, <WH7626> and by your thousands. <WH505>
And when Samuel <WH8050> had caused <WH853> all <WH3605> the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> to come near, <WH7126> the tribe <WH7626> of Benjamin <WH1144> was taken. <WH3920>

When he had caused <WH853> the tribe <WH7626> of Benjamin <WH1144> to come near <WH7126> by their families, <WH4940> the family <WH4940> of Matri <WH4309> was taken, <WH3920> and Saul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of Kish <WH7027> was taken: <WH3920> and when they sought <WH1245> him, he could not <WH3808> be found. <WH4672>

Therefore they inquired <WH7592> of the LORD <WH3068> further, <WH5750> if the man <WH376> should yet <WH5750> come <WH935> thither. <WH1988> And the LORD <WH3068> answered, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> he <WH1931> hath hid himself <WH2244> among <WH413> the stuff. <WH3627>

And they ran <WH7323> and fetched <WH3947> him thence: <WH4480> <WH8033> and when he stood <WH3320> among <WH8432> the people, <WH5971> he was higher <WH1361> than any <WH4480> <WH3605> of the people <WH5971> from his shoulders <WH4480> <WH7926> and upward. <WH4605>

And Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> to <WH413> all <WH3605> the people, <WH5971> See <WH7200> ye him whom <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> hath chosen, <WH977> that <WH3588> there is none <WH369> like him <WH3644> among all <WH3605> the people? <WH5971> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shouted, <WH7321> and said, <WH559> God save <WH2421> the king. <WH4428>

Then Samuel <WH8050> told <WH1696> <WH413> the people <WH5971> <WH853> the manner <WH4941> of the kingdom, <WH4410> and wrote <WH3789> it in a book, <WH5612> and laid it up <WH5117> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068> And Samuel <WH8050> sent <WH7971> <WH853> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> away, every man <WH376> to his house. <WH1004>

And Saul <WH7586> also <WH1571> went <WH1980> home <WH1004> to Gibeah; <WH1390> and there went <WH1980> with <WH5973> him a band of men, <WH2428> whose <WH834> hearts <WH3820> God <WH430> had touched. <WH5060>

But the children <WH1121> of Belial <WH1100> said, <WH559> How <WH4100> shall this <WH2088> man save <WH3467> us? And they despised <WH959> him, and brought <WH935> him no <WH3808> presents. <WH4503> But he held his peace. <WH2790>
